Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

UpdateServiceCapabilities.description: The `UpdateServiceCapabilities` schema contains capabilities of the update service.
UpdateServiceCapabilities.longDescription: This resource shall represent the update service capabilities for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

AllowableStaging.description: The allowable URIs that a client can specify in the `Targets` parameter for update requests when requesting to stage an image on target devices.
AllowableStaging.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of the allowable URIs that a client can specify in the `Targets` parameter for `SimpleUpdate` or `MultipartHttpPushUri` update requests with `Stage` set to `true`.

AllowableTargets.description: The allowable URIs that a client can specify in the `Targets` parameter for update requests.
AllowableTargets.longDescription: This property shall contain an array of the allowable URIs that a client can specify in the `Targets` parameter for `SimpleUpdate` or `MultipartHttpPushUri` update requests.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.
